articles.title: Vans owner VF Corp. is buying streetwear brand Supreme for $2.1 billion - CNN
articles.description: VF Corp. is adding skateboard and streetwear brand Supreme to its line of recreational apparel brands as people seek comfort and leisure wear during the pandemic.
